client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM met Franziska Sophia Mayr at a yacht party in Vienna. They enjoyed a scenic cruise and discussed various investment strategies, which marked the beginning of a successful partnership.
Franziska Sophia Mayr is a 22 year old and comes from Austria.
She was drawn to Julius Baer's holistic financial planning and investment strategies, prompting the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Franziska Sophia Mayr is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: Franziska finished secondary school at Theresianum in 2021.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Franziska Sophia Mayr is a 22 year old and comes from Austria.
Franziska Sophia Mayr did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not have any savings to invest in financial markets.
Client does not have any properties.She inherited 1190000 EUR from her grandfather, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2017, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is excited to help Franziska navigate the challenges of starting a career and building a strong financial foundation.
